name: Elixir
personal_note: Elixir is an incredibly exciting language to use. I was initially drawn to the language for the very terse but descriptive nature of functional languages. While I haven't personally had a need for the performance gains that Elixir can very easily provide, the productivity and Ruby on Rails influenced ease of development has been greatly appreciated.
description: Elixir is a dynamic, functional language designed for building scalable and maintainable applications.

children.name: Phoenix
children.description: A productive web framework that does not compromise speed and maintainability.
